newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Fred Meyer EPS view raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Fred Meyer EPS view raised.

text.p: -- Goldman Sachs raised its 1997 earnings estimates on Fred Meyer Inc to $2.70 a share from $2.55 a share, a Goldman source said.
-- Goldman raised the 1998 earnings estimates to $3.20 a share from $3.05 a share, the source said.
-- Goldman kept Fred Meyer on the priority list.
-- After the market closed Wednesday, Fred Meyer said the recent restructuring of its leases will boost its annual earnings per share by about $0.20 a share in 1997 and future years.
-- Additional details were not immediately available.
